segments.text: Are we supposed to get off right here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think so ; hurry up and get off .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You said this was the right stop .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did we get off the bus too early ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know ; it kind of looks like we did .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why did you tell me to get off ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry . I thought this was our stop .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I really don't feel like walking .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We could always wait for the next bus to come .
segments.speaker: S2
